Name: The Tide
About the game: RELEASING DEXTER STUDIO’S 2nd VR TOON (VR+WEB COMIC) ‘THE TIDE’ STORY One day.. “they” began to appear… No one knows where “they” came from. But one thing is clear tat mans are confronting a life-and-death survival. FEATURES STORY-RICH : VR TOON ‘The Tide’ consists of 6 story-rich episodes, not to mention breath-taking vr experience! INTERACTIVE : This is NOT a simple cinematic vr content. YOU, as a main character, will experience a very highly immersive experiencesthrough in-story interactions. ACCLAIMED ARTWORK : ‘The Tide’ has been OFFICIALLY invited to ’New Frontier’ section of 2019 Sundance Film Festival. Don’t miss out acclaimed world-class VR content!! [VR TOON offers a journey to a 3D web comic environment. You can enjoy web comics to the fullest in Virtual Reality.] Original Story by Cho Seok from Naver Webtoon
